mapper.select: select a.WAREHOUSE_ID,a.WHNAME ,b.STOCK ,b.PK_SOBOOKS from base_warehouse as a left join base_stock as b on a.WAREHOUSE_ID = b.WAREHOUSE_ID where b.GOOD_ID=#{GOODCODE} and b.PK_SOBOOKS = #{PK_SOBOOKS} and IFNULL(a.dr,0)=0

select a.GOODNAME, a.GOODPIC,a.STOCKNUM,a.LASTPPRICE ,c.NAME,a.FZUNIT_ID,b.STOCK from base_good as a left join base_stock as b on a.GOODCODE=b.GOOD_ID left join cp_spunit as c on a.CUNIT_ID=c.SPUNIT_ID where now() >SUBDATE(b.LASTTIME,interval -#{pd.OVERDATE} day) and a.PK_SOBOOKS = #{PK_SOBOOKS} and IFNULL(a.DR,0)=0 limit #{pageNum},10

select a.GOODNAME,a.GOODPIC,a.STOCKNUM,b.NAME,a.FZUNIT_ID ,a.LASTPPRICE from base_good as a left join cp_spunit as b on a.CUNIT_ID=b.SPUNIT_ID where a.PK_SOBOOKS =#{PK_SOBOOKS} and a.STOCKDOWNNUM > a.STOCKNUM and IFNULL(a.DR,0)=0
